channel.title: How do I change the welcome message for my server?
channel.description: I want to change the welcome message, where do I go to change it on my server files?

item.title: How do I change the welcome message for my server?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

If it is a delta based server you must go to client.java and press ctrl+f and search for the current welcome message… ex: welcome to ;keep searching till you find it.
if its a 562/604 go to actionsender I believe ? Not sure haven’t coded 562 for a long while.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the welcome message for my server?
